issue.title: [Python] add .tolist as alias of .to_pylist
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9403](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9403). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed on the mailing list, it helps to write library agnostic code (NumPy/Pyarrow) if arrays support a .tolist(), as alias to .to_pylist().

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9403?focusedCommentId=17156150) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7701
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7701>
